alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued July 06 at 12:59AM MDT until July 06 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...South Laramie Range Foothills and Central Laramie County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If you are driving along I-80 and I-25 this evening and overnight be sure to slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
